name: Spaceship Revenge
description:
Are you ready to take revenge?

Go on an adventure in space by surviving the waves of infected spaceships to claim your skill in the quest for revenge because its a free to play game that lets you experience what is missing.

First before you download: This game is released with some updates but we will keep you up to date on our Facebook page. Link to the page: https://www.facebook.com/LeapingGames/

{How to play}

Movement: WASD

How to control: Mouse
